page.title: 14ST. PETER'S CHURCH (cont.)
page.content: given in l870. There is seating for 700 but 800 - 900 people have been recorded. The important families have their own chapel. The Levens chapel and the Dallam chapel. The vestry was added in l430. The platter (used for communion every week) is valued at Â£l4,000. but two silver flaggons are valued at Â£85,000. are kept in a bank vault. The church runs organisation such as Fish Club, St. Peter's Fellowship, Young Wives, Church Council, The Coir and Mothers Union. The present vicar, the Rev. John Hancock, has been vicar since l976.
